description:
Lisa declares that she will celebrate her love with Mighty-sensei.
But in her heart, she still hadn`t fully given up on Ōtani.
Mighty gently consoles the grief-stricken Lisa and she cries into his chest.
Seeing this, Ōtani freezes in his tracks.
After classes are over, Ōtani and Mighty meet, as he`s become the substitue advisor for the basketball team.
Mighty muses that he might take Lisa for himself.
Ōtani blurts out that he doesn`t like Koizumit that way at all.
Of course Lisa overhears this, and the chasm between her and Ōtani widens yet again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiken na Otoko: Maity no Amai Yuuwaku
Un ragazzo pericoloso. La dolce tentazione di Maity!
危険なオトコ マイティの甘い誘惑
